verses.verse: In that day, <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with his hard <S%H7186><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> and strong <S%H2389><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> will punish <S%H6485><s%> leviathan, <S%H3882><s%> the fleeing <S%H1281><s%> serpent, <S%H5175><s%> and leviathan <S%H3882><s%> the twisted <S%H6129><s%> serpent; <S%H5175><s%> and he will kill <S%H2026><s%> the dragon <S%H8577><s%> that is in the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
In that day, <S%H3117><s%> sing <S%H6031><s%> to her, <S%H2561><s%> "A pleasant vineyard! <S%H3754><s%>

Wrath <S%H2534><s%> is not in me, <S%H8068><s%> but if I should find briers and thorns, <S%H7898><s%> I would <S%H5414><s%> do battle! <S%H4421><s%> I would march <S%H6585><s%> on them and I would burn <S%H6702><s%> them together. <S%H3162><s%>
Or else let him take hold <S%H2388><s%> of my strength, <S%H4581><s%> that he may make <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with me. <S%H6213><s%> Let him make peace with me. <S%H7965><s%>"

In days to come, <S%H935><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> will take root. <S%H8327><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> will blossom <S%H6692><s%> and bud. <S%H6524><s%> They will fill <S%H4390><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> with fruit. <S%H8570><s%>
Has he struck <S%H5221><s%> them as he struck <S%H4347><s%> those who struck <S%H5221><s%> them? <S%H2026><s%> Or are they killed like those who killed <S%H2026><s%> them were killed? <S%H2026><s%>

In measure, <S%H5432><s%> when you send <S%H7971><s%> them away, <S%H7378><s%> you contend with them. <S%H1898><s%> He has removed them with his rough <S%H7186><s%> blast <S%H7307><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the east wind. <S%H6921><s%>

Therefore, <S%H2063><s%> by this the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> will be forgiven, <S%H3722><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> is all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of taking away <S%H5493><s%> his sin: <S%H2403><s%> that he makes <S%H7760><s%> all the stones <S%H68><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> as chalk stones <S%H68><s%> that are beaten in pieces, <S%H5310><s%> so that the Asherim <S%H842><s%> and the incense altars shall rise no more. <S%H2553><s%>

For the fortified <S%H1219><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> is solitary, <S%H910><s%> a habitation <S%H5116><s%> deserted <S%H5800><s%> and forsaken, <S%H7971><s%> like the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> The calf <S%H5695><s%> will feed <S%H7462><s%> there, <S%H7257><s%> and there he will lie down, and consume <S%H3615><s%> its branches. <S%H5585><s%>

When its boughs <S%H7105><s%> are withered, <S%H3001><s%> they will be broken off. <S%H7665><s%> The women <S%H802><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> and set them on fire, <S%H215><s%> for they are a people <S%H5971><s%> of no understanding. <S%H998><s%> Therefore he who made <S%H6213><s%> them will not have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on them, <S%H3335><s%> and he who formed them will show them no favor. <S%H2603><s%>

It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will thresh <S%H2251><s%> from the flowing stream <S%H7641><s%> of the Euphrates <S%H5104><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and you will be gathered <S%H3950><s%> one <S%H259><s%> by one, <S%H259><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

It will happen in that day <S%H3117><s%> that a great <S%H1419><s%> trumpet <S%H7782><s%> will be blown; <S%H8628><s%> and those who were ready to perish <S%H6><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and those who were outcasts <S%H5080><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> shall come; <S%H935><s%> and they will worship <S%H7812><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
